comment: * Contains all genres for audio files

variables.name: INTERNAL_CONTENT_URI
variables.comment: * The content:// style URI for the internal storage.

variables.name: EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI
variables.comment:
* The content:// style URI for the "primary" external storage
             * volume.

variables.name: CONTENT_TYPE
variables.comment: * The MIME type for this table.

variables.name: ENTRY_CONTENT_TYPE
variables.comment: * The MIME type for entries in this table.

variables.name: DEFAULT_SORT_ORDER
variables.comment: * The default sort order for this table

methods.name: public static Uri getContentUri(String volumeName)
methods.comment:
* Get the content:// style URI for the audio genres table on the
             * given volume.
             *
             * @param volumeName the name of the volume to get the URI for
             * @return the URI to the audio genres table on the given volume

methods.name: public static Uri getContentUriForAudioId(String volumeName, int audioId)
methods.comment:
* Get the content:// style URI for querying the genres of an audio file.
             *
             * @param volumeName the name of the volume to get the URI for
             * @param audioId the ID of the audio file for which to retrieve the genres
             * @return the URI to for querying the genres for the audio file
             * with the given the volume and audioID

methodNames: public static Uri getContentUriForAudioId(String volumeName, int audioId)
